Package modules.control

Class UpdateSystemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.control.BaseController
      • modules.control.UpdateSystemController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeneralEnter
    public class UpdateSystemController
extends BaseController
implements GeneralEnter
    Represents a type of controller that is able to do manipulation on system configuration. e.g. Update, create, or delete Holiday

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Admin admin
      This is the amdin who asked for manipulation on system configuration

      • Fields inherited from class modules.control.BaseController

        consoleUI, logMenu, logText

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      UpdateSystemController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI, Admin thisAdmin)
      This is to instantiate a Controller specially for manipulating system configuration

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addCinema()
      This is to add cinema(s) to a current existing cineplex
      private void addCineplex()
      This is to create a new Cineplex object from user input and then save it to the txt file (database) Inside this method, the user will asked to enter all necessary information for a Cineplex
      private void addHoliday()
      This is to create a new Holiday object from user input and then save it to the txt file (database) Inside this method, the user will asked to enter all necessary information for a Holiday
      void enter()
      This is to enter a series of process to change system configuration by firstly provide the admin with a menu including: Add New Cineplex, Add New Cinema, Edit Ticket Pricing, Edit Holiday, and Edit My Password
      private void listHoliday​(int choice)
      This is to list out current holidays for the admin to update of delete
      private void listPrice()
      This is to list out the names of all TicketTypes for the admin to choose from to edit
      private void setNewPassword()
      This is to set a new password for the admin who is operating
      private void updateAdmin()
      This is to validate the current password of the admin who is operating If the entered current password is correct, he/she will the proceed to enter new passwords
      private void updateHolidayOption()
      This is to let the admin indicate whether he wants to Update, Delete, or add new Holiday
      private void updatePriceInfo​(TicketType tt)
      This is to list out regular price and 3D movie price of a specific ticket type for the admin to update values

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • admin

        private Admin admin
        This is the amdin who asked for manipulation on system configuration

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateSystemController

        public UpdateSystemController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI,
                              Admin thisAdmin)
        This is to instantiate a Controller specially for manipulating system configuration
        Parameters:
        inheritedConsoleUI - the ConsoleUI instance passed down from the previous controller
        thisAdmin - a admin who asked for this action

    • Method Detail

      • enter

        public void enter()
        This is to enter a series of process to change system configuration by firstly provide the admin with a menu including: Add New Cineplex, Add New Cinema, Edit Ticket Pricing, Edit Holiday, and Edit My Password
        Specified by:
        enter in interface GeneralEnter

      • updateHolidayOption

        private void updateHolidayOption()
        This is to let the admin indicate whether he wants to Update, Delete, or add new Holiday

      • listHoliday

        private void listHoliday​(int choice)
        This is to list out current holidays for the admin to update of delete
        Parameters:
        choice - 1 for update and 2 for delete, which the admin has indicated in updateHolidayOption

      • addHoliday

        private void addHoliday()
        This is to create a new Holiday object from user input and then save it to the txt file (database) Inside this method, the user will asked to enter all necessary information for a Holiday

      • listPrice

        private void listPrice()
        This is to list out the names of all TicketTypes for the admin to choose from to edit

      • updatePriceInfo

        private void updatePriceInfo​(TicketType tt)
        This is to list out regular price and 3D movie price of a specific ticket type for the admin to update values
        Parameters:
        tt - the TicketType object that the admin indicated before in listPrice

      • addCineplex

        private void addCineplex()
        This is to create a new Cineplex object from user input and then save it to the txt file (database) Inside this method, the user will asked to enter all necessary information for a Cineplex

      • addCinema

        private void addCinema()
        This is to add cinema(s) to a current existing cineplex

      • updateAdmin

        private void updateAdmin()
        This is to validate the current password of the admin who is operating If the entered current password is correct, he/she will the proceed to enter new passwords

      • setNewPassword

        private void setNewPassword()
        This is to set a new password for the admin who is operating
